text: The Hobie Tiger is a Formula 18 developed by Hobie Cat Europe as a one-design within the Formula 18 rules. The class is recognised by the International Sailing Federation. ==Events== ===World Championships=== {| |- | 1999 Torbole | Gérard Navarin Bruno Bomati | Allan Lawrence Gordon McGillivray | Mark Laruffa David Silverster |- | 2001 | Alberto Sonino Gabriele Bruni | Brad Sumner Kevin Winchester | Gavin Colby Cori Camenish |- | 2003 Singapore | Taylor Booth Mitch Booth | Greg Thomas Jacquer Bernier | Gavin Colby Cori Camenish |- | 2005 Santa Barbara | Enrique Figueroa Jorge Hernandez | Taylor Booth Mitch Booth | Moana Vaireaux Petit Romain |- | 2006 Cangas | Jean-Christophe Mourniac Franck Citeau | Moana Vaireaux Petit Romain | Christophe Renaud de Malet Alban Rossollin |- | 2008 Langebaan | Mark Laruffa Daniel Sims | Mitch Booth Tiffany Baring-Gould | Robbie Lovig Lachlan Gibson |- | 2013 | Rob Lovig Andy Dinsdale | Allan Lawrence Daniel Lawrence | Blaine Dodds Peter-Blaine Dodds |} ==See also== * List of multihulls Category:Classes of World Sailing Category:Catamarans
title: Hobie Tiger
